message:
If your CPU-bound ops are not *long* (and not parallelizable), then just use async/await and it should work fine. Bonus points if you can use `ConfigureAwait(false)`, since that will schedule those short CPU-bound ops on thread pool threads in a (somewhat) even fashion.

If your CPU-bound ops are more intensive (or more parallelizable), then look into TPL Dataflow. You can create a "flow" or "pipeline" for your data to pass through, with a mixture of `async` and parallel stages.
